mapper.select: select m.str_id, -- 매장아이디 (select str_nm from oprt_str_mngm where str_id=m.str_id) str_nm, -- 매장명 m.stck_stts_code, -- 재고조사상태코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='STCK_STTS' and code_id=m.stck_stts_code) stck_stts_code_nm, -- 재고조사상태 m.gtwy_qntt, -- 게이트웨이수량 m.stck_cmpl_date, -- 작업완료일 b.bay_type_code, -- 매대유형코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='BAY_TYPE' and code_id =b.bay_type_code) bay_type_code_nm, b.bay_nm, -- 매대명 b.xpsr_rdr, -- 노출순서 t.stck_inch_code, -- 재고인치코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='STCK_NCH' and code_id =t.stck_inch_code) stck_inch_code_nm, t.stck_clr_code, -- 재고색상코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='STCK_CLR' and code_id =t.stck_clr_code) stck_clr_code_nm, t.wrkr_pre_qntt, -- 작업자사전체크수량 r.lbl_id, -- 라벨아이디 r.rgst_date, -- 등록일 case when t.stck_inch_code='TAG_16' and t.stck_clr_code='WHT' then 1 when t.stck_inch_code='TAG_16' and t.stck_clr_code='BLCK' then 2 when t.stck_inch_code='TAG_22' and t.stck_clr_code='WHT' then 3 else 4 end tag_rdr, -- 태그노출순서 r.scan_yn, -- 스캔여부 r.mtch_yn -- 매치여부 from nvnt_stck_mngm m, nvnt_stck_bay b, nvnt_stck_bay_tag t, nvnt_stck_rslt r WHERE 1=1 and m.id = #{id} -- 재고조사아이디 and b.stck_id = m.id and t.bay_id = b.id and r.bay_tag_id = t.id order by b.xpsr_rdr, tag_rdr, r.rgst_date

select m.str_id, -- 매장아이디 (select str_nm from oprt_str_mngm where str_id=m.str_id) str_nm, -- 매장명 m.stck_stts_code, -- 재고조사상태코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='STCK_STTS' and code_id=m.stck_stts_code) stck_stts_code_nm, -- 재고조사상태 m.gtwy_qntt, -- 게이트웨이수량 m.stck_cmpl_date, -- 작업완료일 b.bay_type_code, -- 매대유형코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='BAY_TYPE' and code_id =b.bay_type_code) bay_type_code_nm, b.bay_nm, -- 매대명 b.xpsr_rdr, -- 노출순서 t.stck_inch_code, -- 재고인치코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='STCK_NCH' and code_id =t.stck_inch_code) stck_inch_code_nm, t.stck_clr_code, -- 재고색상코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='STCK_CLR' and code_id =t.stck_clr_code) stck_clr_code_nm, t.wrkr_pre_qntt, -- 작업자사전체크수량 case when t.stck_inch_code='TAG_16' and t.stck_clr_code='WHT' then 1 when t.stck_inch_code='TAG_16' and t.stck_clr_code='BLCK' then 2 when t.stck_inch_code='TAG_22' and t.stck_clr_code='WHT' then 3 else 4 end tag_rdr -- 태그노출순서 from nvnt_stck_mngm m, nvnt_stck_bay b, nvnt_stck_bay_tag t WHERE 1=1 and m.id = #{id} -- 재고조사아이디 and b.stck_id = m.id and t.bay_id = b.id

select pre_dlvr_qntt , -- 조사전 납품수량 pre_dtnl_dlvr_qntt , -- 조사전 추가납품수량 pre_etc_qntt , -- 조사전 기타수량 str_qntt , -- 진열대 수량 br_qntt , -- 백룸 수량 br_dfct_qntt, -- 백룸 불량수량 stck_inch_code, -- 재고인치코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='STCK_NCH' and code_id =stck_inch_code) stck_inch_code_nm, stck_clr_code, -- 재고색상코드 (select code_nm from syst_code_dtl_mngm where prnt_code_id='STCK_CLR' and code_id =stck_clr_code) stck_clr_code_nm, case when stck_inch_code='TAG_16' and stck_clr_code='WHT' then 1 when stck_inch_code='TAG_16' and stck_clr_code='BLCK' then 2 when stck_inch_code='TAG_22' and stck_clr_code='WHT' then 3 else 4 end tag_rdr -- 태그노출순서 from nvnt_stck_info where stck_id = #{id} -- 재고조사아이디 order by tag_rdr
